item.title: Migrating my Portfolio to Astro
item.description: In this post I detail my shift from Next.js to Astro for my portfolio and blog. I explore Astro's benefits, migration challenges, and improved user experience. Astro's native file compatibility and the new content collection system are highlighted, enabling seamless integration without third-party dependencies.
